scripts.dev:all: env FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently -k --raw -n PHOENIX,AMMS,ARB -c "green,yellow,cyan" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/phoenix dev'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/amms dev'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C services/arb-mm dev'"
scripts.live: dotenv -e .env.live -- bash -lc 'SHADOW_TRADING=${SHADOW_TRADING:-0} LIVE_TRADING=${LIVE_TRADING:-1} pnpm dev:all || true; pnpm report:live:live || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true'
scripts.live:jito: dotenv -e .env.live -- bash -lc 'SHADOW_TRADING=${SHADOW_TRADING:-0} LIVE_TRADING=${LIVE_TRADING:-1} SUBMIT_MODE=jito pnpm dev:all || true; pnpm report:live:live || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true'
scripts.shadow: dotenv -e .env.shadow -- bash -lc 'SHADOW_TRADING=${SHADOW_TRADING:-1} LIVE_TRADING=${LIVE_TRADING:-0} pnpm dev:all || true; pnpm report:live:shadow || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true'
scripts.start:all: dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently -k --raw -n PHOENIX,AMMS,ARB -c auto "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/phoenix start || true'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/amms start || true'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C services/arb-mm start || true'"
scripts.start:phoenix: dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C packages/phoenix start
scripts.start:amms: dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C packages/amms start
scripts.start:arb: dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C services/arb-mm start
scripts.backtest:yday: node -e "const d=new Date();d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate()-1);d.setUTCHours(0,0,0,0);const f=d.toISOString();const t=new Date(d.getTime()+86400000).toISOString();console.log(f,t)" | xargs -n2 sh -c 'pnpm backtest -- --from "$1" --to "$2"' _
scripts.daily: pnpm backtest:yday && pnpm report:yday && pnpm optimize:yday
scripts.bootstrap: bash -lc 'set -e; corepack enable >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; corepack prepare pnpm@10.15.0 --activate'
scripts.rebuild:bigint: bash -lc 'set -e; export npm_config_build_from_source=1; MOD="node_modules/.pnpm/bigint-buffer@1.1.5/node_modules/bigint-buffer"; if [ -d "$MOD" ]; then echo "[rebuild:bigint] Rebuilding bigint-buffer native addon"; cd "$MOD" && pnpm dlx node-gyp configure build; else echo "[rebuild:bigint] bigint-buffer not found; skipping"; fi'
scripts.postinstall: bash -lc 'set -e; export npm_config_build_from_source=1; MOD="node_modules/.pnpm/bigint-buffer@1.1.5/node_modules/bigint-buffer"; if [ -d "$MOD" ]; then echo "[postinstall] Rebuilding bigint-buffer native addon"; cd "$MOD" && pnpm dlx node-gyp configure build; else echo "[postinstall] bigint-buffer not found; skipping"; fi'
